3: Although the Constructs manage to fend off the monster's attack, that is not of much help to bettering the situation...
The rudimentary attacks from the Constructs do little to the monster.
Commandant, you're stuck here... It must be the one doing this.
It's a mindless monster, who responded to my wish to keep you here forever... It wants to trap your mind here.
If we destroy it, I can regain control of this domain and release your consciousness from this place.
But now, just relying on our strength is not enough. Only you can unlock the full potential of the Constructs.
This is our last battle... Please lead them to victory!
